title: Jaren Jackson Jr. | Ep. 131 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
itunes:title: Jaren Jackson Jr. | Ep. 131 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
description:
On a BIG episode of ALL THE SMOKE, Grizzlies young star big man Jaren Jackson Jr. joins the boys ahead of the teams start to the NBA playoffs. Jackson Jr. discusses his superstar teammate Ja Morant, the teams mindset heading into the playoffs, and how he got his defensive skills. Plus, he opens up about his college experience and getting drafted in 2018. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
